Architecture
============

Chat page is a Single Page Application (SPA) which is written with AngularJS framework.
There are three options how the user can go to the chat page.
1. As anonimous.
2. As authorized but without the definition about who does he want to speak with.
3. As authorized with identifier of the opponent.

The first option makes user to be able to see only users online. The url is like **http://chat.com/chat#/**.

The second option has the same url **http://chat.com/chat#/** and allow to user to see users online, contact list and user can invite someone to chat.

The trird option has url like this **http://chat.com/chat#/34** and containe identifier of the opponent.
